issue.title: Allow a subset of `<geometry>` instead of `<inertia>`

content.raw: I remember there was talk about changing the default inertia value (from identity matrix) to be something computed on geometry type, mass, and size. So if the `<inertial>` sdf element is not present then compute appropriate values potentially using `ignition::math::MassMatrix3d`
